label: ABC2_mC8_12_a_c_i-004
title: Monoclinic NaNiO$_{2}$ Structure
comments:
Above 220$^{\circ}$C NaNiO$_{2}$ transforms into the rhombohedral \href{current_web_home_dir/ABC2_hR4_166_a_b_c-010}{LiNiO$_{2}$ structure} (Dyer, 1954). 
 The AFLOW label algorithm switches the nickel atom from the (2d) Wyckoff position to the (2c) site.  This requires a shift of the lattice vector $\vec{a}_{3} \rightarrow \vec{a}_{3} - \vec{a}_{1}$.
